name: New Door Ventures
description: New Door Ventures gives young people a way to get on track towards success. New Door uses innovative and evidence-based youth development strategies in our 14 week employment program. Youth participate as a member of a cohort, consisting of 15 – 20 interns. Young people learn with each other during their internships and support their peers. To ensure the health and safety of everyone, New Door is also currently offering a virtual education program for youth interested in high school equivalency.
